title: Watch Face To The Present
summary: Take a time travel to the present with this 80's style Watch Face
description: Aarieer Watch Face To The Present is a Watch Face which featuring 80's style date and time display with an digital LED dislay.Features:* Android Wear Watch Face* 80's design* Digital LED display* Ambient mode supported (Black and white design to protect your OLED screen)Installation:Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatibile device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it.Requirements:*Android Wear device 5.0.1 or higher*Android 4.3 or higher
descriptionHTML:
Aarieer Watch Face To The Present is a Watch Face which featuring 80's style date and time display with an digital LED dislay.

Features:
* Android Wear Watch Face
* 80's design
* Digital LED display
* Ambient mode supported (Black and white design to protect your OLED screen)

Installation:
Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatibile device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it.

Requirements:
*Android Wear device 5.0.1 or higher
*Android 4.3 or higher
comments: Great Scott! You mean you built a time piece out of an Android?!
Very nice..... But please let us have some options such as screen on time, change colours, change layout between month and day.....
Great idea but... Would be much better if you could choose to display the full face in ambient mode. It looks awful in black and white.
